section.title: XML Signatures
section.p: Part of this software can be used to create and verify arbitrary forms of XML Signatures. The documentation available here is not very huge; my first approach is to supply usage examples which are available in the src_samples/ directory to give interested users a first starting point to jump-start with XML Signature.
section.note: The samples divide into two groups: Samples that create and samples that verify Signatures. Eventually, you should adjust the verifying program to another filename if you get FileNotFoundExceptions.

section.title: XML Encryption
section.p: As with signatures, samples are provided to show how to encrypt and decrypt XML content. See src_samples/org/apache/xml/security/samples/encryption.
The samples can be compiled and run using ant encrypt and ant decrypt.
